articles.title: Chiefs restructure Patrick Mahomes' contract to free up over $43 million in cap space - NFL.com
articles.description: Kansas City has begun the process of digging out of their salary cap quandary. The Chiefs converted $54.45 million of Patrick Mahomes’ 2026 salary into a signing bonus, creating $43.56 million in cap room.
